channel.title: RuneLord Alpha [Better combat system, custom minigame, clipped npcs and more++ ]
channel.description:
Last update: 08-06-2012 [size=36pt][color=red]RuneLord Alpha[/COLOR]:[/size] [size=24pt][B]Version: 1.00[/B][/size] [size=24pt]Origninal base: Clean Delta[/size] [size=24pt]This server was built mainly from scratch.[/size] [IMG]http://img256.imageshack.us/img256/3919/sconflictedcopy20120804.png[/img] [size=18pt][B]Game completion: 40%[/B] - This will be updated.[/size] [size=18pt][B]About Server:[/B][/size] [size=20pt][u][b]I have started this project 2 weeks ago, and so far everything has been working out for me.. this server uses the old 2006 RuneScape client and has an auto-updating cache.[/b][/u][/size] Skills: Cooking - 0% Herblore - 90% Woodcutting - 90% Fishing - 80%( need to add shark and manta ray spots ) Slayer - 40% Crafting - 100% [size=14pt][b]Gameframe:[/b][/size] [IMG]http://img28.imageshack.us/img28/7923/pic2gt.png[/img] [size=18pt][font=arial black][b]Server Features:[/b][/font][/size] [size=14pt]Added better combat system. Clipped Npcs 100% Clipped players 15% Custom mini-game (invasion) Fixed over 15 common delta glitches. Auto updating cache. Better skills system 100% player and Npc dialogue Some mini-events and challanges Hidden content ( easter eggs ) - 20% done Better npc system. Fixed syi's, some nulls and most glitches. Fixed duping in every possible way found. Auto-Saving character system. Added frames ( camera movement and fading from black and lots more. ) Range following ( with arrow stacks ) Invasion - All glitches fixed.. Event Manager used for some skills[/size] -THIS will be updated [size=24pt]Media:[/size] [IMG]http://img31.imageshack.us/img31/5867/pic10n.png[/img] [IMG]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/2822/pic9s.png[/img] [IMG]http://img341.imageshack.us/img341/1383/pic8es.png[/img] [IMG]http://img560.imageshack.us/img560/6444/pic6hm.png[/img] [IMG]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/6782/pic3aa.png[/img] [IMG]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/9158/pic7k.png[/img] [IMG]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/1463/pic5qq.png[/img] [IMG]http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/6704/pic4wg.png[/img] [IMG]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/3715/pic1kx.png[/img] [size=18pt]Skype: runelord.support[/size] [b]Clipped npc's and range stacking:[/b] [url=http://www.freeimagehosting.net/h7s36][img]http://www.freeimagehosting.net/t/h7s36.gif[/img][/url] More coming soon!
[b]Beta Tester App.: Name: Age: Email/Skype:[/b]
We also need an assistant programmer/coder[/SIZE][/FONT]
[b]Asst. Programmer App.: Name: Age: Email/Skype: Experience: Months/Years of coding: Proof that you're a legit coder ( link to one of your old projects ): More detail here:[/b]

item.title: RuneLord Alpha [Better combat system, custom minigame, clipped npcs and more++ ]
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

Last update: 08-06-2012

[size=36pt][color=red]RuneLord Alpha[/COLOR]:[/size]

[size=24pt]Version: 1.00[/size]

[size=24pt]Origninal base: Clean Delta[/size]

[size=24pt]This server was built mainly from scratch.[/size]

[size=18pt]Game completion: 40% - This will be updated.[/size]

[size=18pt]About Server:[/size]

[size=20pt]I have started this project 2 weeks ago, and so far everything has been working out for me… this server uses the old 2006 RuneScape client and has an auto-updating cache.[/size]

Skills:

Cooking - 0%

Herblore - 90%

Woodcutting - 90%

Fishing - 80%( need to add shark and manta ray spots )

Slayer - 40%

Crafting - 100%

[size=14pt]Gameframe:[/size]

[size=18pt][font=arial black]Server Features:[/font][/size]

[size=14pt]Added better combat system.

Clipped Npcs 100%

Clipped players 15%

Custom mini-game (invasion)

Fixed over 15 common delta glitches.

Auto updating cache.

Better skills system

100% player and Npc dialogue

Some mini-events and challanges

Hidden content ( easter eggs ) - 20% done

Better npc system.

Fixed syi’s, some nulls and most glitches.

Fixed duping in every possible way found.

Auto-Saving character system.

Added frames ( camera movement and fading from black and lots more. )

Range following ( with arrow stacks )

Invasion - All glitches fixed…

Event Manager used for some skills[/size]

-THIS will be updated

[size=24pt]Media:[/size]

[size=18pt]Skype: runelord.support[/size]

Clipped npc’s and range stacking:

More coming soon!

[b]Beta Tester App.: Name: Age: Email/Skype:[/b]

We also need an assistant programmer/coder[/SIZE][/FONT]

[b]Asst. Programmer App.: Name: Age: Email/Skype: Experience: Months/Years of coding: Proof that you're a legit coder ( link to one of your old projects ): More detail here:[/b]
